intro.title: Welcome
intro.text:
Flick the red disc into the the targets to win the game.

Try to do it in the number of shots indicated on top!

lasers.title: Lasers!
lasers.text:
Careful! There's a laser on your way.
Try to push that button to deactivate it.

teleports.title: Teleports!
teleports.text:
Teleports will bring you to a different location.

This may be another teleport, or sometimes unexpected places

sensors.title: Sensors
sensors.text: Sensors are like buttons, but they can be activated many times, by passing over them
